column4: I tried that, but rename applies it to the directory name too, which breaks find (once "foo foo/match one" becomes "foo_foo/match_one", find's next match "foo foo/match two" doesn't exist anymore)
aha!  well, I did say "something like" :-)
I have trouble getting find and xargs stuff to work properly myself...
tonyyarusso: how about: for file in `find | xargs`; do mv $file ${file// /_}; done
